column4: Hi all ! I was considering switching to ubuntu from a source-based distrib to reduce time spent in working on the distro, but I don't like the 6-month schedule. I'd like a distribution that is has no freezing time, always upstream. Is there a way/a repo to make ubuntu behave like that ?
you could use gutsy. Then when gutsy's released, upgrade to the next version.
stability will be an issue though
ok, thanks. I don't really like to have to upgrade every 6 months...
